text: Bishunpur Baladhari is a village in Hajipur, vaishali district, Bihar state of India. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==Panchayat office== samudayik bhawan Bala Dhari (समुदाियक भवन Bala Dhari ) Panchayati Raj Department,Government of Bihar page number 7 ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance 8 KM) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== SH 74 (State highway 74) Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==Compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== The following villages are in this panchayat:Reports of National Panchayat Directory Ministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India List of Census Villages mapped for BISHUNPUR BALADHARI Gram Panchayat,HAJIPUR,VAISHALI,BIHAR Report printed on 26/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n !villages |- | 1||Kuari Khurd |- | 2||Chak Lala |- | 3||Bishunpur Bala Dhari urf Balwa |- | 4||Panapur Gobrahi |- | 5||Chak Sakra |- | 6||Chak Baladhari |- | 7||Bisrampur Baladhari |- | 8||Chak Sultani |- | 9||Chak Chandaleh |- | 10||Chak Bhoj urf Sahabuddin |- | 11||Chandaleh |- | 12|| Kuari Khurd |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
